headline: Northern Trust Corporation to Webcast Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: CHICAGO, June 24, 2025--Northern Trust Corporation announced today that it will webcast its second quarter earnings conference call live on Wednesday, July 23, 2025. The webcast, the earnings press release, and related presentation materials will be accessible on Northern Trust’s website.

raw.headline: Northern Trust Corporation to Webcast Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call

The webcast, the earnings press release, and related presentation materials will be accessible on Northern Trust’s website.

headline: Northern Trust (NTRS) Jumps 8% on Firm Independence
summary: Northern Trust Corporation (NASDAQ:NTRS) is one of the 10 Stocks That Stole Today’s Spotlight. Northern Trust extended its winning streak to a third straight day on Monday, adding 8.01 percent to finish at $120.81 apiece following commitments to stay independent amid reports that it was offered to be acquired by Bank of New York Mellon Corp […]

headline: Strength Seen in Northern Trust (NTRS): Can Its 8.0% Jump Turn into More Strength?
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions could translate into further price increase in the near term.

headline: Northern Trust plans to stay independent amid merger talks with BNY Mellon
summary: A merger between the two firms could create an investment-management powerhouse overseeing more than $3tn.

headline: Market Chatter: Northern Trust Committed to Staying Independent Amid Report of Possible Merger With BNY Mellon
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) is committed to staying independent, Reuters reported Monday, following a repo
